ComicInfo.Title: Promotions; Door to Door; It's Christmas & Everyone is Nice
ComicInfo.Summary:
A clever employee cuckolds his boss, a lingerie salesman gives his clients the personal touch, and a couple takes in a homeless woman on Christmas Eve... all the way in....
